subject: Fishing, Sport
Bass (Fish)
lead_paragraph: An ambassador for the sport, Guy Eaker has been an elite bass fisherman for 35 years, but he wants to earn a spot in the Bassmasters Classic one more time before he retires.
snippet: An ambassador for the sport, Guy Eaker has been an elite bass fisherman for 35 years, but he wants to earn a spot in the Bassmasters Classic one more time before he retires.
